errors.no_user_found: No user found that corresponds to the input.
errors.no_channel_found: No channel found that corresponds to the input.
errors.permission: You don't have permission to execute this command

weeb.noanime: No anime found for query <query> in <source>
weeb.wiki_fail: Nothing was found for `<query>` in `<wiki>.fandom.com`. Please verify the inputs
weeb.sauce_no_image: No image posted on this channel
weeb.sauce_no_sauce: No sauce found for the pasta. Google yourself.

birthday.no_birthday: No birthday found for the user

success.setbirthday: Set the birthday for <user> with success

mal.description: Command to get a MAL link.
mal.parameters:
**[(optional) type]** type of info (anime/manga/person/character)
**[name]** name or search query

wiki.description: Gets the first article the search find for the given query in the wiki with the given slug.
wiki.parameters:
**[wiki slug]** slug of the wiki page (for example: swordartonline for <https://swordartonline.fandom.com>)
**[query]** search query

setbirthday.description: [Admin Only] Inserts or updates a birthday for the specified user.
setbirthday.parameters:
**[user]** User id, or mention to be set the birthday for
**[day]** Day of their birthday
**[month]** Month of their birthday (January = 1 and December = 12)
**[year]** Year of his birthday (optional)

sauce.description: Looks up the source for the last image uploaded to this channel.

setadminrole.description: [Admin Only] Sets a role that will be able to use the admin commands
setadminrole.parameters: **[role]** ID or name of the role

settrigger.description: [Admin Only] Changes the bot command trigger
settrigger.parameters: **[trigger]** string that corresponds to the trigger

setbirthdaychannel.description: [Admin Only] Sets the channel for birthday messages
setbirthdaychannel.parameters: **[channel]** ID or name of the channel

deletebirthday.description: [Admin Only] Deletes the birthday of a user
deletebirthday.parameters: **[user]**  ID or name of the user

getbirthday.description: [Admin Only] Gets the birthday of a user
getbirthday.parameters: **[user]**  ID or name of the user

birthdays.message: Deem todos os parabéns ao aniversariante de hoje:
birthdays.message_multiple: Deem todos os parabéns aos aniversariantes de hoje:
birthdays.server: Hoje, faz <age> ano que este server foi criado. MUITOS PARABÉNS <name>!
birthdays.server_multiple: Hoje, faz <age> anos que este server foi criado. MUITOS PARABÉNS <name>!
